Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Women were significantly more likely to experience lactic acidosis , while men were significantly more likely to experience immune reconstitution syndrome ( p < 0 . 05 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Lactic acid |

The paragraph mentions "lactic acidosis," which is a condition characterized by an excess of lactic acid in the body. Therefore, lactic acid is the only valid chemical entity in the paragraph.

The paragraph mentions "lactic acidosis," which is a condition caused by an excess of lactic acid in the body. Therefore, lactic acid is the only valid chemical entity in the paragraph. The term "acidosis" refers to a condition of acidity, but it is the lactic acid that is causing the condition in this context.
